translations: Sergey moved to a different house. (İlyas

Preterit.turoyo: b-i=ḥaraytoʕayəfno m-u=ḥāl-ano w-mḥaweli l-ġērbayto 474; 2/53; mḥawéle-li ʕal i=qəṣṭaxanarabṯo d-MawṣalEL 43; Lo fayǝšliraḥatiyebubaytanokolozǝm d mḥawalne. ‘ (İlyas p.c)
translations: In this house there is no comfort anymore I need to move from it.’

Preterit.turoyo: 2) mḥawalle l-abre d-ʕammi 475; prs 192/23; mublullemḥawlulle, mublúlle-le l-u=kon-ayḏeOno buqayṭomḥaweli i ḥurmayḏi. ’(İlyas p.c) Hánostene, mḥawlole l OṣmánAġá
translations: ‘As for this one, Osman Agha married her’ (AA, OA)
